mails.subject: Meeting Reminder
mails.body: Just a reminder that we have a meeting tomorrow at 10:00 AM in conference room B.

mails.subject: Vacation Request
mails.body: I'll be on vacation next week. Can you please handle my tasks during that time?

mails.subject: Team Lunch
mails.body: Let's have a team lunch this Friday to celebrate our recent success.

mails.subject: Weekly Report
mails.body: Attached is the weekly report for your review.

mails.subject: Feedback Needed
mails.body: We need your feedback on the latest designs by Friday.

mails.subject: Important Announcement
mails.body: Please read the attached announcement from our CEO.

mails.subject: Training Session
mails.body: Reminder: Training session on new software tools tomorrow at 9:00 AM.

mails.subject: Request for Proposal
mails.body: We have received a new request for proposal. Please review and provide your inputs.

mails.subject: Team Building Activity
mails.body: We'll be organizing a team building activity next month. Stay tuned for more details.

mails.subject: Project Deadline Extended
mails.body: The project deadline has been extended by two weeks. Please update your timelines accordingly.

mails.subject: Performance Review
mails.body: Your performance review is scheduled for next month. Please ensure all necessary documents are prepared.

mails.subject: New Product Launch
mails.body: We're excited to announce the launch of our new product next week. Stay tuned for the official announcement.

mails.subject: Customer Feedback Survey
mails.body: Please take a moment to complete our customer feedback survey.

mails.subject: Upcoming Holidays
mails.body: Here's a reminder of the upcoming holidays for next month.

mails.subject: Leave
mails.body: Your leave request approved ! Enjoy

mails.subject: Rejection
mails.body: After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that we have decided not to move forward with your application at this time. We received a high volume of applications from many talented candidates, and while your qualifications and experience are impressive, we have selected candidates whose skills and experience align more closely with the requirements of the role

mails.subject: Joining
mails.body: We're thrilled to have you join us. Whether you're here to learn, share, or connect, you're in the right place. Feel free to explore the diverse range of topics, engage with fellow members, and make yourself at home. If you have any questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Together, let's make this community a vibrant hub of knowledge, creativity, and camaraderie. Welcome aboard

mails.subject: Happy Diwali
mails.body: Thanks for wishing us !

mails.subject: Approval
mails.body: Approved your request ! Thank you.

mails.subject: Price
mails.body: Congrats for your slot !

mails.subject: Status
mails.body: Project moved to completed state.Thanks!

mails.subject: Hello there !
mails.body: Thanks for wathing us !
